title: BIG Things I Like
summary:
Following on from Martin’s post about, Tiny Things I Like, I thought to do my version and then I thought, why not go big, after all, I’m a BIG kinda Gal.  So here we go:
BIG Things I Like

Beds
Cups of tea
Breakfasts
Newspapers
Books
Couches

BIG things I don’t like

Crowds
Personalities
Egos
Cities
Airports
Events

And you, what tiny or BIG things do you like. 
#Life #Lists

title: Adding Github-Style Markdown Alerts to Eleventy
summary: I often have occasion to come back to a blog post and add some kind of update.  Maybe I changed my mind or someone offered some new information I hadn't seen at the time of writing.  Up until now I would just add updates willy-nilly; sometimes they'd be at the start, sometimes the end, sometimes in bold, sometimes not...

title: KrebsOnSecurity Threatened with Defamation Lawsuit Over Fake Radaris CEO
summary: On March 8, 2024, KrebsOnSecurity published a deep dive on the consumer data broker Radaris, showing how the original owners are two men in Massachusetts who operated multiple Russian language dating services and affiliate programs, in addition to a dizzying array of people-search websites.  The subjects of that piece are threatening to sue KrebsOnSecurity for defamation unless the story is retracted.  Meanwhile, their attorney has admitted that the person Radaris named as the CEO from its inception is a fabricated identity
